value.title: Surprise! AI chatbots don't increase student cheating afterall, new research finds
value.excerpt: The rise of generative AI tools has many worried about the future integrity of the educational system. After all, if you can get math, writing, and coding help from one free tool like ChatGPT, what's stopping students from using it to cheat on every assignment? Stanford researchers tackle the question in a Q+A published by the university.
